refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: adiabSat computes the saturation temperature Tadiab (in K) and humidity Wadiab (in kg/kg of dry air) given the specific entalpy h (in J/kg of dry air). If the optional argument fig = %t is given, a schematic psychrometric chart pops up with a graphical representation of the stationary state. adiabSat is a main function of the psychrometrics toolbox for Scilab.
